mapper.select: SELECT gdp.year, gdp.gdp, c.country_name FROM world_gdp gdp JOIN country c ON gdp.country_id = c.id WHERE gdp.year = #{year} AND c.country_name IN ( SELECT DISTINCT c.country_name FROM ( SELECT c.country_id FROM race r JOIN circuit c ON r.circuit_id = c.id WHERE r.race_year = #{year}) AS t1 JOIN country c ON t1.country_id = c.id) ORDER BY gdp.gdp DESC;

SELECT c.country_name, t2.year, t2.gdp FROM country c JOIN ((SELECT * FROM world_gdp WHERE (country_id = (SELECT t1.country_id FROM (SELECT * FROM driver d WHERE d.id = #{id}) AS t1) AND gdp > 0 AND ((SELECT year FROM world_gdp w WHERE country_id = (SELECT t1.country_id FROM (SELECT * FROM driver d WHERE d.id = #{id}) AS t1) AND gdp > 0 ORDER BY year DESC LIMIT 1) - year) > #{years}) ORDER BY year DESC LIMIT 1) UNION (SELECT * FROM world_gdp WHERE country_id = (SELECT t1.country_id FROM (SELECT * FROM driver d WHERE d.id = #{id}) AS t1) AND gdp > 0 ORDER BY year DESC LIMIT 1)) AS t2 ON c.id = t2.country_id;

SELECT d.id, d.forename, d.surname, t1.points AS total_points, c.country_name, t3.gdp FROM driver d JOIN (SELECT driver_id, SUM(points) AS points FROM driver_standing GROUP BY driver_id ORDER BY points DESC LIMIT #{m}) AS t1 ON d.id = t1.driver_id JOIN country c ON d.country_id = c.id JOIN (SELECT t2.country_id, t2.gdp FROM (SELECT country_id, SUM(gdp) AS gdp FROM world_gdp GROUP BY country_id ORDER BY gdp DESC LIMIT #{n}) AS t2) AS t3 ON d.country_id = t3.country_id;

SELECT t3.country_name, AVG(t3.gdp) AS gdp FROM (SELECT t1.driver_id, t1.points, t2.gdp, c.country_name FROM (SELECT d.driver_id, SUM(d.points) AS points FROM driver_standing d GROUP BY driver_id ORDER BY points DESC LIMIT #{n}) AS t1 JOIN driver ON t1.driver_id = driver.id JOIN (SELECT w.country_id ci, SUM(w.gdp) AS gdp FROM world_gdp w GROUP BY ci ORDER BY gdp DESC) AS t2 ON driver.country_id = t2.ci JOIN country c ON driver.country_id = c.id) AS t3 GROUP BY t3.country_name;
